vclaim: Top advisers to President Trump believe he is misleading them about being blackmailed by Russia.
title: Do Trump’s Top Advisers Believe He is Misleading Them About Russian Blackmail?
subtitle: An unverified report stemming from an unidentified Twitter user who claims to be a White House insider says President Trump is misleading staffers about being blackmailed by Russia.
author: Bethania Palma
